Uses of Interface
org.opengis.referencing.operation.CoordinateOperationAuthorityFactory

Packages that use CoordinateOperationAuthorityFactory
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.referencing.factory
Creates Coordinate Reference System (CRS) objects from given properties or authority codes.
org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql
Factories for geodetic objects defined in a SQL database, typically the EPSG dataset.
org.apache.sis.referencing.operation
Relationship between any two Coordinate Reference Systems (CRS).
